hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: PKG_VERSION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The version of Perl to build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PKG_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the download tarball and source directory

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "-> Updating 'jenkins-config.git' repo" cd $JENKINS_HOME/src/jenkins-config.git git pull

echo "-> Downloading Perl ${PKG_VERSION}" if [ ! -f ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz ]; then wget -O ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz \ http://www.cpan.org/src/5.0/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz fi

## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE echo "-> Unpacking and configuring Perl ${PKG_VERSION}"
# always unpack fresh source echo "-> Checking for existing Perl ${PKG_VERSION}" if [ -d ${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION} fi
echo "-> Untarring Perl ${PKG_VERSION} in ${WORKSPACE}" gunzip -c ${TARBALL_DIR}/${PKG_NAME}-${PKG_VERSION}.tar.gz | tar -xvf -
cd perl-${PKG_VERSION}
# now run Configure echo "Current directory is: $(pwd)" # -de = use defaults, go on without questions # there's a test in Configure for which file descriptor is connected # to Configure, the wrong file descriptor exits Configure sh Configure -de \ -Dprefix="${WORKSPACE}/output" \ -Dusethreads \ -Duserelocatableinc
